name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - glucosamine and chondroitin
title: cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of glucosamine and chondroitin per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Glucosamine and chondroitin are nutraceuticals used to improve pain associated with osteoarthritis. The
BNF states: 'The mechanism of action is not understood and there is limited evidence to show it is effective'.
NICE guidance on osteoarthritis care and management has the following 'do not do' recommendation: Do not offer glucosamine or chondroitin products
Due to the recommendation from NICE and the lack of evidence as advised by the BNF, the joint clinical working group considered glucosamine
and chondroitin suitable for inclusion in this guidance.
• Deprescribe in patients currently prescribed this medicine.
numerator_bnf_codes_query: SELECT DISTINCT v.bnf_code AS bnf_code FROM {dmd}.vmp v
WHERE LOWER(t.nm) LIKE '%glucosamine%' OR LOWER(t.nm) LIKE '%chondroitin%'
INNER JOIN {dmd}.vmp v ON a.vmp = v.id
INNER JOIN {dmd}.vtm t ON t.id = v.vtm
WHERE LOWER(t.nm) LIKE '%glucosamine%' OR LOWER(t.nm) LIKE '%chondroitin%'
